comment: She will constantly adjusts due dates and adds/removes content, it's incredibly annoying, messes with my calendars, and caused me to miss a quiz. Content itself is not difficult, just read the textbook, do the ZAPS, and you will be fine. She uses Lockdown Browser for the tests, but they are all questions from the quizzes.

This class was alright in my opinion. As long as you study for the content you'll do fine. The quizzes and exams are nearly the same so use the quizzes as study guides for the exams. the Inquizative assignments and ZAPs are easy and often prepare you for what the quizzes might have on them.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Save yourself some time and do not take her. Take anyone else, she does not teach at all. Everything is through a third party website. She does not even know what questions are on quizzes/tests. Does not respond to emails and grades discussion post harshly. If one thing is wrong about your post it is an automatic 50.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: In my opinion, the course itself was not difficult it was just the professor. The professor was awful at responding to students and just generally lacked empathy. This was one of my most unhelpful and rudest professors so far. However, the class is passable. You will pass as long as you do your assignments and at least get a high 60 on the exams.

I received an A for the course, but Dr. Williams is a terrible instructor (which I absolutely despise saying that, but she genuinely is). My class GroupMe was constantly talking about how hard her quizzes and tests were. Reading the textbook and the resources she gives you will not get you far in this class no matter how hard you try.

This was the worst professor EVER! lockdown browser/webcam. She falsely accused me of cheating on the final I currently have no grade in the class because of this. During our meeting, she didn't mention accurate reasons of me cheating..she said the breathing in the videos didn't match mine.overall worst experience of my life .DO NOT TAKE HER

For your peace of mind do not take this professor's class! She doesn't provide adequate study material and her feedback is terrible. The course includes 3 lockdown browser exams, weekly 20-question quizzes, and heavily graded discussion posts. There are also weekly learning curve assignments. The crash course guy will teach you more than her!

Her powerpoints lack the information that she is looking for us to know during the tests, and she doesn't post lectures just crashcourse videos that once again make it hard for us to know how to study. She never answers her emails and when she does she tells you to check the syllabus even when the information is not there.
Dont take her!
TAKE HER so easy, a few super easy Macmillan hws due a week, a 20 question quiz each week no lock down 2 attempts but different questions, like 3 exams webcam honestly super easy class

I tried writing all about her but I was limited to 350 words.
Just honestly do not take her.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Do not take her. Weekly quizzes (hard), discussions, and learning curves. Her tests are impossible, proctored btw, and have a lot of wrong answers she refuses to fix. Probably the worst professor I have ever taken in my college years. You have to read about 30 pages out of the textbook each week and take notes, she doesn't provide any study tools.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Test heavy

comment: Made this account just to warn people about her. She leaves powerpoints that tell you to explore the subject and crashcourse videos for her study resources. You would then expect the tests to be broad and easy but they are detail heavy with stuff not found on her study resources. her response to people asking for a study guide was its not her job.

Do not take, especially if you just need It as a pre-req. She does not care that students are failing, postslong PowerPoints and tells us that we don't need anything else. Extremely tough grader considering this is an introduction class. Her class is tedious and annoying. Test are lockdown with webcam. Discussions are graded very tough. RUN
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Test heavy
